training_captions: Log-periodic dipole array on twin booms with a lumped-port feed at the small-element end and a 300-ohm termination at the long-element end; linear polarization, endfire radiation, and ultra-wide fractional bandwidth.
Seven-element LPDA composed of PEC dipole pairs whose lengths and spacings shrink by a constant ratio, producing an endfire beam toward the feed with stable matching across a very wide band.

Planar LPDA concept: coplanar dipoles mounted on parallel booms, port at the shortest pair, resistive load at the longest; linear-pol, endfire/directive behavior and ultra-wideband impedance characteristics.
